content:
RalfJ said:

all the ideas revolve around valtrees though so we probably also need those before anything can happen

At present, I do not think I will get to valtrees and thus structural match cleanups before July.
Though in July I can probably focus on this fully, it unlocks so many things, unless someone gets to it first, I'm going to make it my priority
Though I can't review anything April-June, either, so we'd need both a reviewer and an implementor if it is supposed to happen before then
cc @RalfJ ^ should we just wait for the second half of the year?
mainly wanted to know if there was some pressure for this and I should try to get some ppl together to work on it
I mean, there are some follow-up cleanups that I am really looking forward to, but they've already waited for half a year and I don't think another half a year would hurt them much ;)
